body: @dmarkov @yegor256 would you guys mind if I ask to be assigned to work on this? I need it in order to continue with my other task.

@yegor256 of course, done already

@carlosmiranda many thanks for your contribution, I just added 15 mins to your account (ID: `DA2128757`)
@longtimeago this task is for you, keep [these principles](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) in mind, and don't hesitate to ask any technical questions

@longtimeago **30 mins** is the budget of the task. This is exactly how much will be paid when the problem is solved (no matter how much time you will actually spend). See [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) for more information
